name: Let Me Some Ground
description:
Developer : Kithwood

Number of people on the project: 1

Language: English

Trailer :

Let Me Some Ground is a game where you control a small astronaut who has made a makeshift spaceship.

It crashes regularly on dangerous planets.

Help them gather all the equipment they need to repair their ship and get back on the road.

Input:

WASD to move

F To view the list of required items

E to pick up object

All 3D assets have been created especially for this game and the Epice MegaJam 2021.
